name: Anarchy In The Island
description:
Welcome to your Personal Island!

Anarchy in the Island is a calm and relaxing game where you can build your own Island. The problem is: according to your decisions, the citizens may become a bad person and freak out. If that happens, the island will run out of control very fast.

How to Play?

The game is fully playable with the Mouse. Left Mouse drags the view, Right Mouse rotates the camera and the middle mouse controls the zoom. You can drag and drop the UI elements to add it into the scene.

....

This game was made in a few hours (like, 2 hours) for the GMTK Game Jam 2020! It's work in progress due to the lack of time remaining before the jam deadline, but I'm planning to update the game later.
